mapper.update: update VOTE set VOTE_TITLE = #{voteTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTE_ACCOUNT = #{voteAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTE_IMAGE = #{voteImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTE_MUSIC = #{voteMusic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOTE_TYPE = #{voteType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANONYMITY_FLAG = #{anonymityFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VALID_DAY = #{validDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VOTE_ID = #{voteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select VOTE_ID, VOTE_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, VOTE_ACCOUNT, VOTE_IMAGE, VOTE_MUSIC, VOTE_TYPE, ANONYMITY_FLAG, VALID_DAY, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME from VOTE where VOTE_ID = #{voteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select VOTE_ID, VOTE_TITLE, START_DATE, END_DATE, VOTE_ACCOUNT, VOTE_IMAGE, VOTE_MUSIC, VOTE_TYPE, ANONYMITY_FLAG, VALID_DAY, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME from VOTE
